last_episode_to_air.name: XV
last_episode_to_air.overview: Everything is on the line as Zoe must save Chase's life, while Harper's misstep puts him in peril.

name: The Old Man
overview: Dan Chase absconded from the CIA decades ago and now lives off the grid. When an assassin arrives and tries to take Chase out, the old operative learns that to ensure his future he now must reconcile his past.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: In Season 2, former CIA agent Dan Chase and former FBI Assistant Director Harold Harper set off on their most important mission to date --- to recover Emily Chase after she is kidnapped by Faraz Hamzad, a powerful Afghan tribal leader. With all three men claiming her as their daughter, Emily finds herself in an identity crisis that has dire implications.

tagline: The lines are blurred, the mission is clear.

episodes.name: I
episodes.overview: When Dan Chase's past catches up to him, he must flee the town he's called home for three decades.

guest_stars.character: Special Agent in Mobile Ops Center
guest_stars.name: Graham Scott Littlefield

episodes.name: II
episodes.overview: Chase finds a temporary hideout, but Harold Harper and the authorities are still after him.

guest_stars.character: Special Agent in Mobile Ops Center
guest_stars.name: Graham Scott Littlefield

episodes.name: III
episodes.overview: Forced to flee, Chase finally tells Zoe the truth about his past, but it might be too late.

episodes.name: IV
episodes.overview: Both Chase and Harper try to move forward with their plans, but their choices backfire.

episodes.name: V
episodes.overview: Chase and Harper face decisive tests. Zoe finds a new path forward as old stories resurface.

episodes.name: VI
episodes.overview: Chase and Zoe enter the lion's den. As Harper ends one partnership, another begins.

episodes.name: VII
episodes.overview: Chase is forced to face the consequences for his past choices. Harper learns an impossible truth.

episodes.name: VIII
episodes.overview: Now in Afghanistan, Dan Chase and Harold Harper have to evade the Taliban in order to save Emily.

episodes.name: IX
episodes.overview: Emily Chase learns of her true identity as the daughter of Faraz Hamzad while outside forces threaten her and her new family.

episodes.name: X
episodes.overview: Dan and Emily Chase reunite for the first time in many years and must protect the Hamzad village from the Taliban.

episodes.name: XI
episodes.overview: Chase and Harper try to convince Morgan Bote to help Emily, but when Zoe McDonald resurfaces, they realize the story's much bigger than they thought.

episodes.name: XII
episodes.overview: Chase, Harper, and Zoe take refuge in Harper's house only to receive tragic news.

episodes.name: XIII
episodes.overview: Chase and Zoe must track down Hamzad's lawyer in London, while Harper must recruit an unlikely partner.

episodes.name: XIV
episodes.overview: Chase is taken captive by Suleyman Pavlovich as he risks everything to save Zoe. Harper must go to the opposite end of the earth to confront his past.

episodes.name: XV
episodes.overview: Everything is on the line as Zoe must save Chase's life, while Harper's misstep puts him in peril.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: In Season 2, former CIA agent Dan Chase and former FBI Assistant Director Harold Harper set off on their most important mission to date --- to recover Emily Chase after she is kidnapped by Faraz Hamzad, a powerful Afghan tribal leader. With all three men claiming her as their daughter, Emily finds herself in an identity crisis that has dire implications.
